Name: Number of Developers
Description: Count of developers assigned per team

Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Length of each sprint in days

Name: Planned Story Points
Description: Total story points planned per sprint

Name: Allocated Budget
Description: Budget allocated per project in USD

Name: Number of Testers
Description: Count of QA testers per sprint

Name: Backlog Refinement Hours
Description: Hours spent on backlog refinement per sprint

Name: Documentation Effort
Description: Hours allocated to feature documentation per feature

Name: Release Candidates
Description: Number of candidate builds before release

Name: Skill Training Hours
Description: Hours dedicated to training per competence
